product_name: Carson C6 Screen Cleaner - Package of 2
long_description: The Carson C6 screen cleaner is compact and easy to use. Its soft, retractable pad and dry cleaning formula wipes away smudges, grime and fingerprints with ease. Cleaner is ideal for cleaning screens on tablets and smartphones.
short_description: The Carson C6 screen cleaner is compact and easy to use. Its soft, retractable pad and dry cleaning formula wipes away smudges, grime and fingerprints with ease.
